plot: A young man, Lynus Wicker, awakes in an anonymous void only to be confronted by two representatives for Human Soul Regeneration - posing a question to leave Lynus to choose his own fate in the moment between life and death.
title: Pull the Trigger, Mr. Wicker
plot_es: A young man, Lynus Wicker, awakes in an anonymous void only to be confronted by two representatives for Human Soul Regeneration - posing a question to leave Lynus to choose his own fate in the moment between life and death.
plot_en: A young man, Lynus Wicker, awakes in an anonymous void only to be confronted by two representatives for Human Soul Regeneration - posing a question to leave Lynus to choose his own fate in the moment between life and death.
